approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

balanceOf.description: Returns the account balance of another account.

allowance.description: Returns the amount that a spender is allowed to withdraw from an owner.

mint.description: Mints new tokens to a specified account.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

checkpoints.description: Gets the checkpoint for a given account at a given position.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a given account.

delegate.description: Delegates the caller's votes to another account.

delegates.description: Returns the address delegated to by an account.

getVotes.description: Returns the current number of votes for an account.

getPastVotes.description: Gets the number of votes for an account at a specific block number.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Gets the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

grantRole.description: Grants a role to an account.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a role from an account.

renounceRole.description: Allows an account to renounce a role.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role that controls a specific role.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract supports a specific interface.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for an owner account.

permit.description: Approves tokens using a signature, according to EIP-2612.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

DelegateChanged.description: Emitted when an account changes its delegate.

DelegateVotesChanged.description: Emitted when the votes of a delegate account change.

RoleAdminChanged.description: Emitted when the admin role for a role changes.

RoleGranted.description: Emitted when a role is granted to an account.

RoleRevoked.description: Emitted when a role is revoked from an account.
